Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Using SaltStack to configure Check_mk

Pim Jeursen

Using SaltStack to configure Check_mk Automatically installing a monitoring agent (Check_MK) on Linux and Windows servers using Salt. On +/- 300 servers it was necessary to install the monitoring agent and after that the config needed for this agent was dynamically loaded using Salt.

About the Speaker

Pim Jeursen, Snow B.V. engineer
